description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-45357)- Option to disable downlevel-revealed type of conditional comments during export to HTML 
(CELLSNET-45330)- Render comments when saving as image, HTML or PDF 
(CELLSNET-45014)- Support style.xml of the chart since office 2013 
(CELLSNET-45501)- Set Default Style of GridDesktop similar to Aspose.Cells.Workbook.DefaultStyle both on Design Time and Run Time 
(CELLSNET-44243)- Skip locked cells while navigating with Tab on GridDesktop component 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-45517)- Add support for Share xlsx file
(CELLSNET-45554)- Synchronize or update the Comment in Client-side after Cell Comment is updated in Server-side 
Performance
(CELLSNET-45530)- MS Excel consumes more memory (approx. 2GB) to open the output file 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-45531)- Position of shape text is wrong in the output PDF - Excel to PDF conversion 
(CELLSNET-45507)- Diagrams not rendered correctly in Output Pdf 
(CELLSNET-45477)- Issues with rendering shapes in Sheet to image conversion 
(CELLSNET-45473)- Text Alignment issues when saving an XLS file as HTML by Aspose.Cells APIs 
(CELLSNET-45536)- Text being cut when rendering Excel sheet to Image 
(CELLSNET-45524)- Redundant line appeared while rendering shapes in Sheet to image conversion 
(CELLSNET-45522)- Cells to PDF - footer not wrapping when the footer text contains
(CELLSNET-45512)- Aspose.Cells creates massive EMF file when rendering Sheet to image file 
(CELLSNET-45508)- Data is being truncated even after auto fit rows 
(CELLSNET-45495)- Add digital signatures to already signed document 
(CELLSNET-45553)- Chart in resulted PDF has unexpected values 
(CELLSNET-45551)- Image become black when rendering to PDF file format 
(CELLSNET-45547)- Sparklines are not smoother in the output EMF image 
(CELLSNET-45514)- ErrorBar caps are not rendered correctly 
(CELLSNET-45398)- Secondary axis title in charts was rendered incorrectly 
(CELLSNET-45570)- Excel file is corrupt due to data validation range after opening and resaving it via Aspose.Cells APIs 
(CELLSNET-45560)- Error message is shown in Microsoft Excel after calling RemoveMacro() method 
(CELLSNET-45555)- Cells.GroupRows isHidden attribute displaying incorrectly with nested groups 
(CELLSNET-45552)- Linked images are duplicated inside the chart when opening and re-saving an XLSX file 
(CELLSNET-45549)- Output XLS file is corrupt on opening and saving Source Xls file 
(CELLSNET-45548)- SpreadsheetML AllowFilter element doesn't work in the output XLSX
(CELLSNET-45546)- Missing cell data while opening and saving ODS file 
(CELLSNET-45544)- While moving the range, the formula only refers to the first cell of the range 
(CELLSNET-45543)- Moving conditionally formatted cells removes formatting 
(CELLSNET-45541)- H7 in space.xlsx - space is not displayed 
(CELLSNET-45540)- H9 value in ref.xlsx changes on saving 
(CELLSNET-45534)- Workbook.Unprotect method is working even with wrong password 
(CELLSNET-45532)- Allow whole number data validation with formula not working 
(CELLSNET-45529)- ListObject.Resize changes format and sets filter 
(CELLSNET-45520)- Comment fields are not correctly opened from SpreadsheetML 
(CELLSNET-45518)- Data Validation in the output Excel file is not working 
(CELLSNET-45509)- Embedded objects/images are not rendered in Excel to PDF conversion 
(CELLSNET-45505)- Some shapes are displaced in XLS file when extracting and re-inserting images 
(CELLSNET-45504)- Leading quote characters missing from output xlsx file 
(CELLSNET-45502)- Workbook duplication generate corrupted file for Excel 2016/2007 
(CELLSNET-45527)- By applying group rows to hidden rows (in frozen pane) causes the GridWeb uneditable 
(CELLSNET-45523)- Some hidden rows are wrongly displayed in GridDesktop 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-45472)- Exception: "Shape to image Error" when rendering a XLSX file to PDF file format 
(CELLSNET-45550)- System.NullReferenceException on opening the source Excel file 
(CELLSNET-45526)- Exception when saving XLSX files to XLSB file format 
(CELLSNET-45519)- Exception on opening the template XLSB file (Office 365 (1707 update))
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
